speaker: Sushang
line: Uh, this is...

speaker: Sushang
line: Huh? You're pretty familiar with this place.

speaker: Sushang
line: Yep, it's the Alchemy Commission. No wonder we were getting those military broadcasts on the way over — something about the Cloud Knights gathering here, right? They're probably coming to fix the Stellaron problem.

speaker: Sushang
line: *sigh* It's been such a long journey, but now we're finally gonna meet some Cloud Knights! I'll be back with my unit!

speaker: Sushang
line: I didn't lie to you, right? I told you I'd bring you somewhere safe, and I did! Though... we did take a bit of a detour...

speaker: Luocha
line: Before I arrived in Starskiff Haven , I had a diviner read my fortune for the journey ahead. He told me not to be concerned with the destination, but to seize my chances and travel with the current to reap the greatest harvest.

speaker: Sushang
line: ...Meaning?

speaker: Luocha
line: Meaning thank you, Miss Sushang.

speaker: Sushang
line: Oh... okay. Well, I'm gonna go report to the nearest captain.

speaker: Sushang
line: You guys can hang around here, but don't run off too far — there'll be Cloud Knights coming to escort you back soon. Bye for now!

text: Messages Trailblazer (Trailblazer) The Cloud Knights invited us to go with them Your homeland's got some really big crucibles Cloud Knights? Dan Heng Why are you with the Cloud Knights? Aureate Elixir Furnace? Dan Heng Why are you near the Aureate Elixir Furnace? Message failed to send

speaker: Dan Heng
line: ▶ (The messages never get sent... I wonder what's happening with those three?)

speaker: Dan Heng
line: (The Cloud Knights seem to be gathering for the Stellaron disaster... but why did Kafka want us to come here? What happened to them? And what happened to Blade ?)

speaker: Dan Heng
line: (I've delayed for too long. I need more information...)

text: Leave the Healer's Market on your own
(Optional) Talk with people in the market to understand what is happening

title: Mission Description
content: On the other side ofLuofu, Sushang parks the skiff at the Alchemy Commission's Healer's Market after making contact with the Cloud Knights. The three finally land after a tumultuous journey. This was once a part of your familiar home. Memories of the past swell up into your mind, and countless bygone shadows swivel before your eyes. However, your friends are currently missing. You have no plans to remain here.

speaker: Sushang
line: What's up?

children.speaker: Sushang
children.line: Go? Go where? The Luofu is under lockdown — the Cloud Knights' operation isn't over yet.

children.speaker: Sushang
children.line: Relax. When the fight is over, I'll personally escort you and Mr. Luocha home~

children.speaker: Sushang
children.line: Don't worry. Once the fight is over, I'll personally escort you and Mr. Luocha home~

speaker: Luocha
line: You haven't been back home for a long time, have you Master Dan Heng?

children.speaker: Luocha
children.line: Ah... is that so? Apologies.

children.speaker: Luocha
children.line: As home draws nearer, so our feelings grow stronger. I can see it in your eyes.

speaker: Luocha
line: Do you want to leave? Then do it now.

speaker: Luocha
line: The Cloud Knights will soon check our identities. I have somewhere else to be — I've tarried here too long.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: ...Where are you going?

speaker: Luocha
line: I'm a traveling merchant. I have one more deal to see through.

speaker: Sky-Faring Commission Foxian
line: I heard that starskiff connections are being reinstated. The people stranded at the Alchemy Commission should all be able to leave soon.

speaker: Deranged Disciple
line: The master was defeated? No... N—No that cannot be!

speaker: Excited Cloud Knight
line: Good news from the front lines! The Disciples over at Evemist Mansion have been defeated.

speaker: Cloud Knight Captain
line: The Disciples of Sanctus Medicus started a rebellion in the Alchemy Commission — the Cloud Knights have the area locked down. It's not safe, please remain here for now.

speaker: Cloud Knight Captain
line: We will send someone to escort you back once the operation is over.

children.speaker: Cloud Knight Captain
children.line: Lunatics — all of them. You saw the Ambrosial Arbor , I assume? I heard that's the work of those sorcerers. Still, I can't say too much — military secrets.

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: (The Arbor's resurrection is connected to the Disciples' rebellion... I've heard those names before, but when?)

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: ▶ (How did (Trailblazer) and the others get drawn into all this...?)

children.text: (Dan Heng briefly described to the captain the appearances of March 7th and the crew.)

children.speaker: Cloud Knight Captain
children.line: You must be talking about the general 's guests. Are they your friends?

children.speaker: Cloud Knight Captain
children.line: What a coincidence — they left with the master diviner not long ago. It's all thanks to their courageous work that the Knights don't have to worry about the poison in Evemist Mansion.

children.speaker: Cloud Knight Captain
children.line: I received the good news from the front lines. They'll probably be back soon.

text: Thanks. That's all I wanted to know.

children.speaker: Cloud Knight Captain
children.line: Strange, you seem oddly familiar to me... Never mind, too many misfortunes recently — I can hardly think straight.

speaker: Mumbling Cloud Knight
line: Those Travelers defeated the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus... Won't that make us seem... incompetent?

speaker: Mumbling Cloud Knight
line: I—I need to find a way to make this report sound more... impressive.

speaker: Rejuvenated Cloud Knight
line: Thanks to those heroes I managed to pull through. Could those guests of the general be the Galaxy Rangers of old?

speaker: Captured Disciple
line: The master must have failed to summon the protection of Sanctus Medicus — her will must have wavered.

speaker: Captured Disciple
line: Just you wait — I'll show you the blessing of Sanctus Medicus.

text: (Upon trying to leave in the wrong direction)

speaker: Dan Heng
line: (Seems this road is guarded by the Cloud Knights. I need to find another way...)

text: Find out where the Trailblazer and the others are

speaker: Dan Heng
line: (I'm sorry, I have to catch up to my friends. Thank you for looking out for me on this journey, both of you...)

text: (Upon trying to turn back after leaving)

speaker: Dan Heng
line: (Now's not the time to turn back. If the Cloud Knights hold me up, I won't reach them in time.)

speaker: Dan Heng
line: (I need to be careful. If I alert the Knights, they might take an interest in me...)

speaker: Past Echo
line: What a huge cauldron.

speaker: Past Echo
line: This aureate cauldron is driven by the cloudhymn magic of our people — the Vidyadhara . It drinks the water of the ancient sea like a whale swallows the tide, and refines it into medicinal pellets...

speaker: Past Echo
line: All the elixir crucibles that the Vidyadhara helped to construct contain cloudhymn magic. You should take this chance to learn more, young master...

speaker: Past Echo
line: Huh? But I don't need any sort of device to help me command water, what more is there to learn?

speaker: Past Echo
line: You are indeed the chosen one, with endless potential... yet cloudhymn magic is just the beginning.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: A Vidyadhara Mirage Echo... Have these shadows of the past yet to disperse?

speaker: Dan Heng
line: These memories...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: No. They have nothing to do with me anymore.

text: Take the starskiff and enter Scalegorge Waterscape
(Interact with Vidyadhara Mirage Echo along the stairway, optional)

speaker: Past Echo
line: They say that you are Long 's power incarnate. Is that true?

speaker: Past Echo
line: Hmph...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Aargh... Long...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: I was exiled from the Xianzhou. I am no longer one of the Scions of Permanence .

text: (Interact with Vidyadhara Mirage Echo at bottom of stairway, optional)

speaker: Past Echo
line: I doubt I will be here to see you take charge...

speaker: Past Echo
line: No need to feel aggrieved. Vidyadhara go through cycles of life and death, existing forever in this world.

speaker: Past Echo
line: By the time you are the high elder , my hatching rebirth will be complete and I will be a child once again. Please take care of me.

speaker: Past Echo
line: This surging power... It's you... You've returned, High Elder.

text: (Interact with Vidyadhara Mirage Echo at the end of the pier)

speaker: Past Echo
line: Something terrible is happening in Scalegorge Waterscape. Please don't go any further... Your enemies... Your enemies are waiting for you.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: I'm sorry, I cannot linger here. My friends have left — I must find them.

speaker: Past Echo
line: You didn't heed us then, and won't heed us now... as headstrong as you always were.

speaker: Past Echo
line: It seems you already made your decision. There is a vessel bound for Scalegorge Waterscape located ahead.

text: (Cutscene of Dan Heng heading to Scalegorge Waterscape)

speaker: Blade
line: You're here.

speaker: Kafka
line: Mm, right on time.

speaker: Blade
line: ...That feeling, Kafka — it's welling up within me. That feeling! I—It's...

speaker: Kafka
line: Don't resist. Let the mara strike you...

speaker: Blade
line: You're here.

speaker: Blade
line: *laughing in madness* It's time to pay the price! It's time!!!

speaker: Blade
line: You think changing form will help you escape!? Escape...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: I have told you and that woman many times... I am Dan Heng.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: I have nothing to do with your past.

speaker: Blade
line: Dan Heng... You think another name and face can blot out the sin of your past? You... You didn't even experience death...

speaker: Blade
line: I will force this suffering upon you, "Dan Heng." You will know the pain of death!
Hmph, not on my watch.

speaker: Yanqing
line: You're not murdering anyone today, fugitive. You're coming with me.

speaker: Blade
line: Jing Yuan's lapdog... Did the general not teach you to choose your battles wisely...?

speaker: Yanqing
line: Hey, move back. Things are about to... Huh?

speaker: Yanqing
line: You... you look so familiar...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Look out!

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: Quit hiding.

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: Your true self...

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: reveal it!

children.speaker: Yanqing
children.line: Stop!

children.speaker: Yanqing
children.line: You...!

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: I have news for you, boy...

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: Behind you is none other...

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: ...than the traitor of the Xianzhou!

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: A criminal, forever banished!

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: The High Elder of the Vidyadhara...

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: Imbibitor Lunae

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: You really thought the Stellaron Hunters were the only ones to infiltrate the Xianzhou?

children.speaker: Yanqing
children.line: In that case... I'll bring both of you to justice!

children.speaker: Yanqing
children.line: I've heard of you, Imbibitor Lunae...

children.speaker: Yanqing
children.line: First it was the Stellaron Hunters, now an exiled criminal has infiltrated the Xianzhou...

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: ...I have no interest in stoking conflict. I came to ensure the safety of my friends.

children.speaker: Yanqing
children.line: Save your excuses for the Shackling Prison.

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: Out of the way!

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: Hahaha, better, but I'm afraid you won't be seeing your friends.

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: They're caught in their own bitter struggle.

children.speaker: Yanqing
children.line: Silence! You're not getting away either!

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: ...Is that so? Let's heat things up then. Kafka!

children.speaker: Kafka
children.line: Bladie, listen to me: Unleash the mara.

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: ... So it begins.

children.speaker: Yanqing
children.line: Surrender!

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: What's wrong, afraid to hurt the boy?

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: (I wonder if the others are okay...)

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: (Gotta make this quick...)

children.speaker: Yanqing
children.line: You two just won't give up...

children.speaker: Yanqing
children.line: I only have one choice...

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: ...So familiar.

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: Did she teach you?

children.speaker: Blade
children.line: Then you deserve no mercy!

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: (Can't delay any longer...)

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: *long sigh* I didn't wish to harm anyone... But there's no other way. Forgive me.

children.speaker: Yanqing
children.line: This... isn't over...

speaker: Kafka
line: All of you, listen to me — stop.

speaker: Kafka
line: Well, Bladie? Are you satisfied?

speaker: Blade
line: Hmph.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: ...What did you do?

speaker: Kafka
line: I'm just clearing the stage for the grand entrance — can't have you three misbehaving in front of the Luofu's hotshot general.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Haha.

speaker: Blade
line: Jing Yuan...

speaker: Yanqing
line: General!

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Many years have passed since the two of you departed the Xianzhou, and yet the circumstances of your return appear to be equally unhappy. If you still thought of me as a friend, you should've forewarned me.

speaker: Blade
line: My task is complete.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Mm, that it is.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Thank you for assisting the Xianzhou in this small matter. Take this person away — I will pretend I didn't see anything this time.

speaker: Yanqing
line: General!? I...

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Now is not the time.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: It has been a long time... old friend.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: I'm not him.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Mm... I'm sorry.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: You cannot leave yet — your Astral Express friends are waiting for you in Scalegorge Waterscape. Shall we go and see them together?

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Lunarescent Depths — a realm of singular beauty. Scalegorge Waterscape is the same as when I last laid eyes on it... and here we stand so different from one another. The flesh of long-life species may be immortal, but the constant of heaven and earth eludes them.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: You know the Vidyadhara hatching rebirth cycle, general. The waters of the ancient sea have cleansed Dan Feng of his past sin. The person that once stood here alongside you is no more.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: I am Dan Heng . Whether Dan Feng was hero or villain has nothing to do with me. I bore his punishment, accepted my eternal banishment without complaint... but do not let his shadow cloud your estimation of me, general.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: *sigh* Raising old nets only darkens the water — an exercise in unhappiness. Perhaps it is your visage, the horns on your head, or the unmistakable air of the high elder that makes the separation nigh impossible for me.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: ...I already told you—

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: You did... but to what effect? If words alone were enough to change the heart, this world would be without quarrel. If you wish to rid me of the illusion of Dan Feng , you must do something for me.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Before I can let Dan Feng die and revoke your banishment edict, I need him to do me one final favor. I can guarantee you that when it is done, you will no longer walk in anyone's shadow aboard the Luofu.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: I may not be capable of the things that Dan Feng was capable of.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: You must do it, or my promise will count for naught. If you wish to blame someone, blame your previous incarnation. Had he not committed that terrible sin — had the power of dragon transmutation been passed on intact — I would have no need to compel you.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: It is as I said: Here we stand so different from one another. Dan Feng is no more — now there is only Dan Heng . But I...

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: I am the general of the Luofu. There are things that I wish I did not have to do, and yet I must.

speaker: Jing Yuan
line: Haha, let us talk of happier tidings. The friends you made on the Express are here. Do you wish to see them?
